title: 01 - The Colour of Magic - Terry Pratchett
description:
The Colour of Magic

By Terry Pratchett

Read by Nigel Planer

Unabridged audio book encoded at 192kbs

6 CD&#039;s

Synopsis

On a world supported on the back of a giant turtle (sex unknown), a gleeful, explosive, wickedly eccentric expedition sets out. There&#039;s an avaricious buy inept wizard, a naive tourist whose luggage moves on hundreds of dear little legs, dragons who only exist if you believe in them, and of course the edge of the planet. 

Enjoy
